original_title: Der Gauner und der liebe Gott
overview: With the help of God, the loveable safecracker Paul Wittkowski – aka “Cracker-Paulie” – manages to escape the clutches of the cops.  He dresses up as a priest and ends up in a village, whose pastor is in dispute with an influential businessman.  To help the pastor and a young widow, Paulie has to use his own special abilities.  This work leads him back to the path of righteousness.  He contacts the police and, after serving his time, starts a new life with the widow.
title: Crook and the Cross
